name: Access Request Reviewer
description: Sent to each access reviewer who needs to review an access request.
subject: New access request for ${requestedForIdentityName} ready for review
body:
Dear ${user.name},

${requesterName} has requested the ${requestedObjectName}#if(${requestedObjectType}=="Role") role #elseif(${requestedObjectType}=="Entitlement") entitlement #else access profile#end#if($requesterName != $requestedForIdentityName) for ${requestedForIdentityName}#end.

#if($requesterComments)

${requesterName} gave the following reason for requesting access: ${requesterComments}.

#end #if($removeDate)

The sunset date for ${requestedObjectName} is ${removeDate}.

#end #if($requestedObjectType=="Role") #if($accessibleItems && $accessibleItems.size() > 0)

If this request is approved, ${requestedForIdentityName} will receive access to the following:

    #foreach($item in $accessibleItems)
  • $item
    • #end

#end #elseif($requestedObjectType=="AccessProfile")

If this request is approved, ${requestedForIdentityName} will receive access to all entitlements in ${accessProfileName}.

#end

Go to $identityNowUrl/ui/d/approvals to approve or deny this request.

Thanks,
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} Team
